extras.enable_particle_distance_check.to: If enabled, particles that is far from you will not be renderer, distance configurable below.
extras.max_particle_distance.name: Max Particle Distance
extras.max_particle_distance.tooltip: The straight line (Unit: Blocks) used for the rendering check from you to the particle
extras.clear_skies.name: Clear Skies
extras.clear_skies.tooltip: Removes the banding at the horizon of Vanilla Minecraft
extras.showMemory.name: Show Used Memory Percentage
extras.showMemory.tooltip: If enabled, the used memory will be appended after the fps
extras.showGpu.name: Show Used GPU Percentage
extras.showGpu.tooltip: If enabled, the used GPU will be appended after the memory or fps
extras.showPlayTime.name: Show Gameplay Time
extras.showPlayTime.tooltip: If enabled, your gameplay time will be appended after the fps
extras.shut_up_gl_error.name: Disable Potenial GL Error On Pressing Keys
extras.shut_up_gl_error.tooltip: There was never a real error going on here - not the kind you should have to worry about and definitely not the kind that should pollute logs constantly.
extras.fix_gpu_memory_leak.name: Fix GPU Memory Leak
extras.fix_gpu_memory_leak.tooltip: If enabled, Embeddium Extras will try to remove out-dated resources every second through a range of means to prevent potential memory leak.
extras.fastchest.name: Fast Chest
extras.fastchest.tooltip:
Remove chests' dynamic models (aka BlockEntityRenderer) and making them render as static chunk geometry, like most normal blocks. 
This means they will lose their lid opening animation.
extras.jei.name: Hide JEI Items
extras.jei.tooltip:
Tweak JEI rendering so that the item list does not display unless search is active. This de-clutters the screen significantly unless you're actively using JEI. 
 NOTE: If you are a modpacker, it's not recommended to default enable this option for your end users as they may get confused about that.
extras.zoom.option.name: Zoom
extras.extras.options.name: Extras
extras.cloud_height.name: Cloud Height
extras.fog.name: Enable fog
extras.fog.tooltip: Toggles off all fog in the overworld.
extras.display_fps.display.name: Display FPS
extras.display_fps.display.tooltip: Displays the current FPS. Advanced mode also displays minimum FPS, as well as 15 second average FPS, which are more useful for judging performance.
extras.display_fps.position.name: FPS Display Position (Unit: Pixels)
extras.display_fps.position.tooltip: Offsets the FPS display from the top-left or top-right corner of the screen.
extras.display_fps.right_align.name: Right-align FPS Display
extras.display_fps.right_align.tooltip: Aligns the FPS display to the right side of the screen. Useful if you have other overlays that show on the left side of the screen. Does nothing if the Display FPS option is set to Off.
extras.enable_max_entity_distance.name: Enable Max Entity Distance (Unit: Blocks)
extras.max_entity_distance.name: Max Entity Distance
extras.max_entity_distance.tooltip: Hides entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
extras.vertical_entity_distance.name: Vertical Entity Distance
extras.vertical_entity_distance.tooltip: Hides entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
extras.vertical_tile_distance.name: Vertical Tile Distance
extras.vertical_tile_distance.tooltip: Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
extras.max_tile_distance.name: Max Tile Distance
extras.max_tile_distance.tooltip: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.
extras.zoom.lower_sensitivity.name: Lower Zoom Sensitivity
extras.zoom.lower_sensitivity.tooltip: Lowers your sensitivity when zooming to make it feel more consistent.
extras.zoom.scrolling.name: Zoom Scrolling
extras.zoom.scrolling.tooltip: Allows using scroll wheel to adjust zoom amount.
extras.zoom.transition.name: Zoom Transition Mode
extras.zoom.transition.tooltip: Controls how the game changes from normal to zoomed. Off will be an instant transition.
extras.zoom.keybind.name: Zoom Keybind Mode
extras.zoom.keybind.tooltip:
Hold - Zoom only while the key is down.
Toggle - Lock zoom until you press the key again
Persistent - Always zoom, if you want that, for some reason.
extras.zoom.overlay.name: Zoom Overlay
extras.zoom.overlay.tooltip: Renders a vignette overlay when zooming.
extras.zoom.cinematic_camera.name: Cinematic Camera Options
extras.chunk_fade_in.name: Chunks Fade In Speed Modifier
extras.chunk_fade_in.tooltip: Controls how fast chunks fade in. No performance hit, higher value will make it quicker. 30 will disable this feature.
